item.title: [DISTRELEC-7359] NPS Value is not sent to e-mail

The value is present in the test system. I made a test with Mignon Latoschinski.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7337] Increase JVM code cache
item.description:
Do to the today outage and do to experience from other projects,
increasing the code cache could solve the problem.

-XX:+PrintCompilation
-XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m

For details about the problem please see: DISTRELEC-7336

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Francesco

Can you please take care of this immediately and the parameters above for Q + P in the branch v3.6.

René

I have added the following property 

tomcat.javaoptions=XX:+PrintCompilation -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m

to the following files:

  • /environment/env-hp-q-app-common/hybris/config/local.properties
  • /environment/env-hp-p-app-common/hybris/config/local.properties

wrapper.java.additional.28=-XX:+PrintCompilation
wrapper.java.additional.29=-XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m
Because of the massive problems this week, I do the change directly in the wrapper.conf of the production (node 01,02,03,04)
Deployment of v3.6.2 to Q done, please test.

After Deployment I found this when I grep on the log

[hybris@datblbk02003x(env-hp-q-app 01):/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/log]$ ps -aux | grep PrintCompilation
Warning: bad syntax, perhaps a bogus '-'? See /usr/share/doc/procps-3.2.8/FAQ
hybris    6936 21.3 26.0 12019904 4247988 ?    Sl   15:52  16:12 /data/jdk1.7.0_80/jre/bin/java -server -Xmx8G -Xms8G -XX:PermSize=300M -XX:MaxPermSize=700M -XX:+PrintGCDateStamps -XX:+PrintGCDetails -Xloggc:/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/log/gc.log -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Dorg.tanukisoftware.wrapper.WrapperManager.mbean=true -Djava.endorsed.dirs=../lib/endorsed -Dcatalina.base=.. -Dcatalina.home=.. -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Dlog4j.configuration=log4j_init_tomcat.properties -Djava.util.logging.config.file=jdk_logging.properties -Djava.io.tmpdir=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/temp/hybris -Dorg.apache.cxf.Logger=org.apache.cxf.common.logging.Log4jLogger -Duseconfig= -DHYBRIS_BIN_DIR=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/bin -DHYBRIS_CONFIG_DIR=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/config -DHYBRIS_DATA_DIR=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/data -DHYBRIS_LOG_DIR=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/log -DHYBRIS_TEMP_DIR=/data/project_distrelec/hybrisserver/hybris/temp/hybris XX:+PrintCompilation -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m -Ddeployed.server.type=tomcat -Djava.library.path=../lib -classpath ../lib/wrapper-3.5.13.jar:../bin/bootstrap.jar -Dwrapper.key=prJC6mF43vcs_-WjcfVQ-_GvKoHTxhDf -Dwrapper.port=32000 -Dwrapper.jvm.port.min=31000 -Dwrapper.jvm.port.max=31999 -Dwrapper.disable_console_input=TRUE -Dwrapper.pid=6934 -Dwrapper.version=3.5.13-st -Dwrapper.native_library=wrapper -Dwrapper.service=TRUE -Dwrapper.cpu.timeout=30 -Dwrapper.jvmid=1 -Dwrapper.lang.domain=wrapper org.tanukisoftware.wrapper.WrapperSimpleApp org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap start
hybris   14773  0.0  0.0 103252   824 pts/3    S+   17:08   0:00 grep PrintCompilation

Looks like there is a minus missing

 *-*XX:+PrintCompilation -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m
please fix

Sorry, my mistake.
I've added the missing minus sign and i've committed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7304] ELFA migrated customers - missing company information
item.description:
It was reported for migrated customer accounts they are missing some company information in MyAccount:

  • Company Name
  • VAT-ID
  • Billing address
  • Shipping address

Please check if this problem consists after the second login. Please use the mentioned accounts in DISTRELEC-7288.

UPDATE: The reason is missing old-/new-contact-id mapping for NL in Q.
item.summary: ELFA migrated customers - missing company information

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7196] Dangerous goods screen is not fully updated
item.description: There is a bug when dangerous goods are added/removed into/from the cart the dangerous goods message is not updated with all the numbers of the dangerous goods.
item.summary: Dangerous goods screen is not fully updated

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Evangelos

please add print screens, and also please point out some articles to do the retest

thank you
All the 3 items should be shown on the message. The last one was added in the cart from the Direct order and it is not shown.
This looks like basical a frontend task so assigned it to Ruben. Thx

Hi Neeraj,

We have to use Ajax.

I need a BE service that gives me the dangerous products contained in the cart.
It must contain the same HTML format as the current method "addDangerousGoodsWarningmessage"

Thanks
BE work is done. Please go ahead Ruben
please test after the next deployment
Vangelis can you please retest with a dangerous good the below ticket?
The problem still exists. If you change the DG number of materials or choose other ones, when pressing recalculate, the message doesn't get updated with the correct article numbers.

Hi Evangelos Laou
The fix has not been deployed yet on Test system.
Deployment of v3.6.2 to Q done, please test.
Unfortunately the problem still exists. If you change the DG number of materials or choose other ones, when pressing recalculate, the message doesn't get updated with the correct article numbers.
Had 3 DG items and the message included all of them. When I remve the 2 of them and press recalculate the message isn't updated correctly and includes all 3 DG still, while only one is left.
Issue still exists

Hello Ruben,
I think that should be with you.

Hi Ruben

Seems like you missed to check in file dangerousProductsMessage.jsp on branch v6.2, I found it on trunk.

Please commit the file here:-

http://svn.distrelec.com/repositories/Distrelec-Relaunch-2012-intern/branches/v3.6/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/views/desktop/fragments/terrific/cart/dangerousProductsMessage.jsp

Commited in the right branch.
Waiting for next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6987] SEO/UX - Fluctuation Issues - product with stock and EOL replacement to Display - Duplicate
item.description:
Observations :

  • DISTRELEC-6526 have been deployed without final validation on Q.
  • By testing on P, incorrect behavior have been discovered :
    • Products with stock and EOL replacement inside search/category results redirect to their their upper available node folowing the rules defined by DISTRELEC-6526.
    • On certain case the redirected landing page change the clickable behavior of the product displayed as results, exemple :
      • 500 error on every products for a search of 102997
      • infinite redirection on the upper category node for the search of the id :
        • 100335
        • 14021833
        • 600323

Impact :

  • SEM : Google Shopping is detecting the faulty redirection, we have until the 10/07/15 to correct it or they will cut the entire advertising (-30% of SEM traffic).
  • UX : The user is lost if he interact with this bugged functionality.
  • UX : Once a visitor have encountered this navigational bug, his navigation path is blocked, major increase of bounce rate to expect.
  • SEO/SEM : Correct landing pages are redirected to a non relevant/functionnal page.
  • This behavior is happening for XX% of the products. (XX tbd)
  • XX% are not accessible on Hybris. (XX tbd)

Demands :

  • When a 0 stock product become EOL and :
    • we don't have a correct replacement product => Redirect in 301 to their upper category level url, (if there is no category available redirect to the homepage, same logic as implemented on DISTRELEC-5960).
      Exemple (if this product is EOL) : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/16924407 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../c/cat-186834
    • we have a replacement for the product => Redirect in 301 to the replacement product url.
      Exemple (if this product is EOL) : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/16924407 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/new_productid_replacing_EOL
  • Inform the user :
    • if redirection on category page, display a popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life. We show you products from the same category."
    • if redirection on the home page, display a discrete popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life and won't be replaced. We have redirected you to the homepage."
    • if redirection on product page, display a popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life. We show you the replacement product."
    • if we have a replacement for the product but the product still have stock, display a popin on the product page showing this message :
      "The product you are looking for is end of life. The product XXX id NNN is the replacement."

=> In Blue, new requirement from the UX side.
=> In Black, the requirement already implemented with DISTRELEC-6526.

Checking process :

  • This issue cannot be deployed on P without a check on dev/Q and a written confirmation of PHUBERT in the comment below.
  • This issue cannot be closed without final live check on P.
  • Update the status of the deployment on dev/Q/P in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO/UX - Fluctuation Issues - product with stock and EOL replacement to Display - Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Rafael : This sub-ticket linked to a blocking ticket is also a blocker.
We are currently redirecting available product to another page.
With this behavior, a part of the assortement is not accessible on every hybris webshop !!!!

Converted subtask to issue as sprint planning is already finished and this CR was put in afterwards. This issue needs to go through the sprint planning process first. If it is a blocker or not is always a question of perpective.

@Rafael & Rene : Is it possible to escalate it into the sprint 2015-06 ?
If not possible, I need a rollback to previous state on DISTRELEC-6526 for the Sprint 2015-07.
The impact for the user is critical, any navigational test done by UX until now create at least once this issue.

The impact for the user is critical, any navigational test done by UX until now create at least once this issue.

I don't understand this. What is exactly the problem?
Everything written in "Observations".
How will the display of the message avoid the error "500 error on every products for a search of 102997"?

by not doing the 301 redirect on product with EOL status and stocks.
Exemple with this search :

  • First result (with the redirect on an EOL with stock)
  • First result (as an available product, no redirect) :

@Pierre

infinite redirection on the upper category node for the search of the id :

Do you know the rules from eolProduct for FactFinder?
Are they removed from FactFinder when the stock is 0?

I would say yes, but I can't certify it.
I'm checking with Daniela and give you a feedback asap !

I checked with Laura. FF product display is depending on 2 column, "stock" and "buyable".
When stock and buyable are equal to 0 the product is not displayed.
When stock and buyable are equal or superior to 1 the product is displayed.
No dependancy on eol column, since it's mean we have detected a replacement product but we still can have stocks.
(the 0 stock product are not removed from FF index since we could access them).

The product 102997 is still in the FF index.
So this will also lead to an infinite loop.
@Laura : Can you check the product 102997 inside FF and give us the value of the columns eol, stock and buyable ?

In stock = 0
Buyable =0
Replaceable=

{"eolDate":"2014-01-14 07:03:44","buyable":false}

@pierre

Please see my print screen, this product is still displayed.
@rene : yes it's apparently linked to DISTRELEC-6644 (see blocked by).

@Will

Like discussed before, can you please clarify why this product (102997) is visible in the shop and who (FF or hybris) is responsible to exclude them from the shop.

Hi René

Daniela does also not know why this buyable=false articles are in FF. Then I checked the searchPageController. If the article wont be found in FF we would only show the no results page to the customer.

But opening this search request http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=102997 results in redirecting to an EOL page and then to www.distrelec.ch.
Same for this: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/p/102997

The only way to get to the replacement product I found is entering 102997 in the search box and use the product suggestion link.

Information stored in FF for 102997:

Replacement	{"eolDate":"2014-01-14 07:03:44","buyable":false}
Buyable	0

We should define the behavior for this products together I think. At the moment its not clear to me & Daniela.

When would you have time for this?

Thx
Will

Hi Will

Just a quick remark:

{"buyable":false}

is the - let's say - normal content for available products. The problematic ones are potentially the others, which have more/different content (e.g. EOLdate. etc).

/Daniela

I fount the product with the link from the description above:

500 error on every products for a search of 102997

and then clicked to the second page.

Hi Will
This is ticket is only about displaying the message for products which are EOL and still have stock.

if we have a replacement for the product but the product still have stock, display a popin on the product page showing this message :
"The product you are looking for is end of life. The product XXX id NNN is the replacement."

All redirects are part of the ticket: DISTRELEC-6526 which is still blocked.

Hello Francesco

Can you please take care of this.

I've implemented the logic to:

  • Display the EOL product with still some stock level and inform the customer with a popin.
  • Redirect the EOL product to the replacement and inform the customer with a popin. (see http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-6526?focusedCommentId=41740&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-41740)

Pierre, the issue will be solved with v3.6.0.
You should start testing in dev system or wait for the deploy in test (17th of July)

Thank you Francesco !
I'll start to test on Q next week.
I can't test the ticket until this is solved : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-6988

Hi Pierre
as discussed yesterday i've solved the following issue:

  • a customer search for a specific text (eg: "102997")
  • the search results ends into a single EOL product (eg: 14079968)
  • the EOL product has no stock and no replacement therefore is redirected to the up category.
  • the customer click a product of the category
    At this point we have a complete inconsistent behavior as described before.

The issue is caused because of the search querystring that the system keep track (q=102997), this because the customer should be able to navigate with arrow links through the search result. But in this specific case the search result is not valid anymore since we have been redirected to the upper category.

Therefore to solve the issue, in those cases of redirection because of EOL i always clean the search query parameters.

Please test in next release in q system.
This is the case study
http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=102997

As discussed with Angel, a ticket for the removal of the arrow have already been validated several month ago (validated by marketing and IT).
@Francesco Bersani | SAP : If you can't simply solve the issue please consider to handle this ticket to remove the feature and then go back on the EOL.
(I don't know which ticket it is I wait Angel feedback).
@Angel Munoz | Distrelec Can you provide the ticket id of the next/prev product feature removal ?
Deployment of v3.6.2 to Q done, please test.

Review on Q :

  • Sample per case test :
    case pid behavior details expected behavior
    1 11026312 product displayed popin about linked category OK product displayed + popin about linked category
    1 13766044 product displayed popin about end of life NOK product displayed + popin about linked category
    1 17644777 product displayed popin about linked category OK product displayed + popin about linked category
    1 18583338 product displayed popin about linked category OK product displayed + popin about linked category
    1 30007824 timeout ? NOK product displayed + popin about linked category
    case pid behavior details expected behavior
    2 11028242 product displayed + popin about wrong replacement product NOK product displayed + popin about product replacement
    2 13609691 product displayed + popin about wrong replacement product NOK product displayed + popin about product replacement
    2 14843010 product displayed + popin about wrong replacement product NOK product displayed + popin about product replacement
    2 15612952 product displayed + popin about wrong replacement product NOK product displayed + popin about product replacement
    2 18248611 product displayed + popin about wrong replacement product NOK product displayed + popin about product replacement
    case pid behavior details expected behavior
    3 11039240 redirect to wrong replacement product + popin NOK redirect to replacement product + popin
    3 11053813 redirect to wrong replacement product + popin NOK redirect to replacement product + popin
    3 13745081 redirect to replacement product + popin OK redirect to replacement product + popin
    3 17004259 redirect+ to category+ with popin NOK redirect to replacement product + popin
    3 18080591 redirect to wrong replacement product + popin NOK redirect to replacement product + popin
    case pid behavior details expected behavior
    4 11034538 redirect to homepage without popin NOK redirect to homepage + popin
    4 12549623 redirect to homepage without popin NOK redirect to homepage + popin
    4 14475061 redirect to homepage without popin NOK redirect to homepage + popin
    4 16572550 redirect to homepage without popin NOK redirect to homepage + popin
    4 18297360 redirect to homepage without popin NOK redirect to homepage + popin
    case pid behavior details expected behavior
    5 11033343 redirect to category with popin OK redirect to category with popin
    5 13096605 redirect to category with popin OK redirect to category with popin
    5 18227860 redirect to category with popin OK redirect to category with popin
    5 30003785 redirect to category with popin OK redirect to category with popin
    5 30014917 redirect to category with popin OK redirect to category with popin

@Francesco Bersani | SAP : As discussed before the deploy on Q, the issue on the wrong replacement is solvable by identifying and using the replacement type values.
Please provide asap the list of corresponding types and samples.

Not ready for P

My comments below:

status product comment
OK 13766044 The current behavior is correct. After the last pim import most probably the category has been unlinked to this product. Now this product has stock but is not part of any category, therefore the current EOL behavior is correct
OK 30007824 the behavior is correct, but during the display of similar products a problem occur because the similar product are related to category cat-647184 that is a family contains 5279 products in test system. This is causing a timeout
OK 11034538 fixed in next release v3.6.3
OK 12549623 fixed in next release v3.6.3
OK 14475061 fixed in next release v3.6.3
OK 16572550 fixed in next release v3.6.3
OK 18297360 fixed in next release v3.6.3
OK 17004259 The behavior is correct since there is no stock and no replacement the user is redirected to the upper category
NOK 11028242 no replacement reason specified. DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification
NOK 13609691 no replacement reason specified DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification
NOK 11039240 no replacement reason specified DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification

NOK 15612952 replacement reason Better/Equivalent DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification
NOK 18248611 replacement reason Better/Equivalent DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification
NOK 18080591 replacement reason Better/Equivalent DISTRELEC-7375 for clarification

Part of the ticket will be fixed in v3.6.3.
Missing part is the replacement reason handling (ticket DISTRELEC-7375)
ticket closed, please comment any update on the master ticket DISTRELEC-6526

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6526] SEO - Fluctuation Issues - Product EOL Handling - Main ticket
item.description:
Observations :

  • There is a fluctuation of our assortment of products over time due to product life circle.
  • Since Hybris implementation, this result into 10% of accessible indexed (by google, or reco engine) product pages that are redirected in 302 to the EOL page.
  • Google have and is crawling/indexing thoses pages.
  • Those products pages have and will accumulate over time "seo weight".
  • For February 2015 in CH, 9000 users have consulted at least one product page leading to an EOL page.
  • The landing page EOL have a bounce rate of 75%.

Impacts :

  • Google is wasting crawl time on 0 content pages.
  • We are not transmitting this weight to the new pages related to the EOL.
  • The number of 0 stock indexed product page are going to grow over years.
  • No SEO correction = Destroying/not transmitting the accumulated seo weight of those previously content filled pages.
  • No SEO correction is an equivalent of a failed SEO migration on a growing part of the website.
  • No correction equal a major lost of users during browsing.
  • We loose 75% of the users on this page (9000 user per month)

Demands :

  • When a 0 stock product become EOL and :
    • we don't have a correct replacement product => Redirect in 301 to their upper category level url, (if there is no category available redirect to the homepage, same logic as implemented on DISTRELEC-5960).
      Exemple (if this product is EOL) : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/16924407 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../c/cat-186834
    • we have a replacement for the product => Redirect in 301 to the replacement product url.
      Exemple (if this product is EOL) : http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/16924407 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/.../p/new_productid_replacing_EOL
  • Inform the user :
    • if redirection on category page, display a popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life. We show you products from the same category."
    • if redirection on the home page, display a discrete popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life and won't be replaced. We have redirected you to the homepage."
    • if redirection on product page, display a popin showing this message :
      "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life. We show you the replacement product."
    • if we have a replacement for the product but the product still have stock, display a popin on the product page showing this message :
      "The product you are looking for is end of life. The product XXX id NNN is the replacement."

=> In Blue, new requirement from the UX side.

Demands details :

  • If this demand go against usability request, it can be implemented only for bots (but it will still be 10x better than 80% of bounces rate on the EOL page).
  • Ideally, the redirection /p/old =301> /c/ should be handled at 100% by hybris like here : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5960
  • Ideally, the redirection /p/old =301> /p/new should be provided by PIM through SAP, If not possible directly handle by Hybris with a connection on SAP raw data.
    this raw sap data is findable in this SAP view :

Checking process :

  • Need to be verify locally by PHUBERT
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Fluctuation Issues - Product EOL Handling - Main ticket

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Redirection is ok from usability point of view, however, there needs to be some information for the customer to tell them that the product is EOL. The same little "banner" could be used that is used in the redirect pages, with the information "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life. We show you products from the same category."

Most important, however, is that the people maintaining the products finally get to know how to maintain replacement products so that we can redirect to really relevant content. This information is still not available.
@Daniela : Thx ! I add a comment about this

@Pierre

Would it be possible to provide me some sample products which are EOL?

@Rene :

  • http://www.distrelec.ch/p/11028897
  • http://www.distrelec.ch/p/11026804
  • http://www.distrelec.ch/p/16731328
    ..
Fixed for release v3.4.
Please wait for the deployment of the version v3.4 before testing.
When can I check it on Q ?

No unfortunately not. On the Q system will first be an other deployment of the v3.3 release.

You cloud test it on the DEV system, from tomorrow.
But since I do not have access to the DEV system, I don't know about the state of the data (pim,erp).
I will try tomorrow on DEV system.

@Rene : It work perfectly on dev for product to category redirection.
Did you find an example of EOL product redirected to the new corresponding product ?

Text translation for every countries must be setup before deployment.
I will provide them asap in cooperation with marketing team

@Pierre
Do you need sample products for the DEV or Q system?
(I don't have access to the DEV, so you would need to ask your DEV-Team to get samples from HMC or HAC).

I informed Nabil about the translation and he has some workflow to organise them.
@Rene : the origin of the sample doesn't matter, I just want to test it.

Sample Product on TEST: 11033608

The query to get the sample products with eol and replacement product:
select {p.code} from {product as p}, {DistSalesOrgProduct as dp} 
  where  {dp.product} = {p.PK} 
  and {dp.salesOrg} = 8796094650841 -- switzerland
  and {p.replacementProduct} is not null
  and {dp.endOfLifeDate} is not null

With this exemple it doesn't seem to work :

  • On Q :
    • http://test.distrelec.ch/p/11033608 =301> http://test.distrelec.ch/cms/productEOL =302> http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/Product%20EOL/cms/productEOL (200)
  • On DEV :
    • http://dev.distrelec-ch.distrelec.com/p/11033608 =301> http://dev.distrelec-ch.distrelec.com/
  • What we are expecting on P :
    • http://www.distrelec.ch/p/11033608 =301> http://www.distrelec.ch/p/the-replacement-product-id

on Q

Can you add a fallback 301 redirect to the homepage for those EOL case not matching the 2 properly handled EOL case.

What is the benefit from redirecting to the hompage instead of eolPage?
Translations are pending by Rafael. see: DISTRELEC-6473

What is the benefit from redirecting to the hompage instead of eolPage?

=> EOL current page = worst page on the website (bounce rate >75%). (In a a/b test I divided the bounces rate by 5 by redirecting it to the homepage in .js with our tag manager).
=> Transfer of seo page weight to a useful page (aka the homepage) (product with faulty data are at 99% pages used by bot not users, the data would be corrected if it was the case).

count of products with replacement product and from-date

on Q :

  • 2401 < 01/01/2020
  • 3679 > 01/01/2020

on P:

  • 798 < 01/01/2020
  • 1340 > 01/01/2020

Can you add a fallback 301 redirect to the homepage for those EOL case not matching the 2 properly handled EOL case.

Yes, I can do that, but we need to display a message. that at least we know why we are redirected to the homepage.

Not mandatory for this case, but indeed better :

if redirection on the home page : display a discrete popin showing this message : "Unfortunately, the product you are looking for is end of life and won't be replaced. We have redirected you to the homepage."

Not mandatory for this case

Just for my understanding:

  • "bounce rate >75%" means: User coming to the page an leaving directly without clicking somewhere else.
  • "bounce rate" has nothing directly todo with the bot, except, that it should be remove from the index.

Correct?

"bounce rate >75%" means: User coming to the page an leaving directly without clicking somewhere else.

yes, exactly !

"bounce rate" has nothing directly todo with the bot,

yes and no ! Since one of the seo factor is the bounce rate measure for a dedicated indexed & ranked page on a keyword, at the end it negatively influence the ranking & the bot !

except, that it should be remove from the index.

From pure seo point of view, not "removed" but redirected to transmit (and not loose) the ranking potential of those old product pages to somewhere more interesting (in this case the homepage since we have nowhere else to provide) !
thanks for the explenation

The information comes from SAP. Here we can set put in suggestions for replacement.
This to show an alternative product in some way.

When entering a customer order in SAP, you will get a popup and get the info that we have an alternative.
We do NOT classify if it is a new product or not. Can be like this case, where we have another base/packing unit.
But are also used when products get end of life and there is a replacement.

I don’t know decided to have this incorrect info on the web. No one has approached me at least….

From New SAP – ZINFO transaction.

Her are the variation of replacement level we can use.
_A no popup, replaces the material direct in the order entry. (In SAP)
_M popup and you manually need to choose.

Elfa.se displays also this info, but with the text “see also”

The information comes from SAP. Here we can set put in suggestions for replacement.

Hi Pierre,

Hi Pierre,
i've implemented the logic to avoid the product replacement handling in case of EOL.
This functionality can be switched on or switched off using the paramenter:

distrelec.eol.replacement.enabled=true/false

At the moment this parameter is:
true : in the test environment
false: in the production environment

In test environment if we want to test the new behavior with the replacement product switched off, we have to manually configure the parameter to false
